description:
(Register at MasterclassOnTour.com with promotional code DDM Brussels to sign up with 50% discount!)

This Masterclass on Tour is the second edition of the sold-out Masterclass Digital & Social Marketing held in Dublin on September 20-21, 2013.

The January Masterclass provides an alternating program of practical, intensive digital marketing and social media workshops in Dublin, hosted by the premier digital marketing and social media companies in the world, including Facebook, LinkedIn, HubSpot, Google, Marketo, Yammer, Acquia (Drupal),DataXu and Twitter.

Participation fee is € 1995 per person, including all flights and two nights hotel.

DDM Amsterdam MeetUp members can sign up at a 50% discount until December 31, 2013!

Click here to read the 2013 Masterclass review by Frankwatching (The largest Dutch online marketing channel).

venue.name: HQs of Facebook, Twitter, Google, LinkedIn and HubSpot

name: Masterclass Digital & Social Marketing in Dublin

description:
Join us for a unique opportunity! On March 18, Twitter will visit the Headquarters of DDB Brussels for a workshop on its platform. Space is extremely limited, and we are very excited to be able to offer this complimentary to members of DDM Brussels (that's right - it's FREE - but only if you're a member of the DDM Brussels MeetUp Group). However, to ensure every available seat will have an attendee in it, we do ask for 25 euro deposit. When you attend the event on March 18, we will make note of your presence and refund you the 25 euro immediately. Topics to be covered:
- Vision
- Audience: facts, numbers, measurements
- Twitter ads : our different products
- Advanced functionalities : latest products functionalities, with a special focus on television. Registration: http://twitterbxl.eventbrite.ie

Please note: we will start inviting people in our network to attend as well (as long as they're based in Belgium). We have a very limited number of spots available, and I'd like to make sure existing members of this MeetUp have first dibs. Please do register as quickly as you can, as I do expect an influx of new members when we (and Twitter) start inviting potentially new members.

I look forward to seeing you on March 18!
name: Experience a unique Twitter workshop! (by Twitter and at no cost)

description:
Please register by clicking here. 

With the onset of programmatic buying and real-time media, it is possible to run more targeted advertising than ever before. To effectively leverage these new technologies to drive the best performance and ROI, it's essential to understand how the real-time advertising ecosystem is evolving.

The goal of this webinar is to provide marketers with a solid grasp of the digital advertising landscape. While our sector evolves at top speed, understanding the fundamentals will prove an invaluable resource to help grow your business and your career.

The 45-minute course will cover: 
• The Evolution of Advertising: the rapid emergence of different marketing platforms 
• Real-Time Bidding: the opportunity and challenge for marketers
• The Online Advertising Ecosystem: the ad tech players and how they interact 

The Real-Time Advertising Crash Course webinar is hosted in partnership with Quantcast. The content is taken from Quantcast’s Real Time Advertising Academy which is accredited by the IAB and ISBA in the UK.

Please register by clicking here.
name: Free Webinar: Real-Time Advertising Crash Course

description:
We are pleased to invite you to Programmatic 101, the first in a series of webinars on programmatic marketing in partnership with the Yieldr Academy. The webinar series will take you through the programmatic landscape, starting with the basics all the way through to detailed programmatic executions.

Please register for free at: http://www.eventbrite.com/e/yieldr-academy-webinar-series-on-programmatic-registration-13958378887

Programmatic Advertising
We know you’ve heard a lot about it and you know it’s more than a trend. According to Magna Global, programmatic media spend will reach $21B globally this year and will steadily grow at an annual rate of 27%, to reach $53B by 2018. Programmatic is already a necessary channel for companies to execute their advertising and quickly become the “new norm.”

Programmatic Education is key
There is a knowledge gap between the digital marketing expertise needed by organizations and the talent actually available to them. In order to fully maximize the potential of programmatic ad spending and execute the most effective campaigns, continued education is a must.
Put yourself in line for success by educating yourself on programmatic knowledge and empower yourself with the tools to take your business to the next level with programmatic marketing. Something as seemingly complex as programmatic can only be learned through a hands on process.
name: Free Webinar: Programmatic 101

description:
The Data-Driven Monday MeetUps take place every second Monday of the month, and in every city the DDM Alliance is active in.

Join us for insights on data-driven marketing from international and local speakers as well as networking opportunities with marketers from both brands as well as agencies. 

Exact program and venue to be announced!
name: DDM: Data-Driven Monday
